maybe add all exception handlers in single class since the actual handler is a method and not class level annotation
good point, we can keep it on a single class.
isn't this sort of cyclic dependency? I know it might not be strictly cyclic dependency but feel wrong to have the starter here...

This is a point I'm talking with @evacchi and @cristianonicolai to see how can we proceed, but probably we will work on them on different PRs/Jiras.
